description: An MBO where the management team purchases the company. It is used as a method for taking a company private or restructuring.

examples.chinese: 公司计划进行管理层收购
examples.translation: The company plans to conduct a management buyout.

examples.chinese: 管理层收购后公司将退市
examples.translation: The company will be delisted after the management buyout.

examples.chinese: 投资者关注管理层收购的估值
examples.translation: Investors are paying attention to the valuation of the management buyout.
